titles.title: VentDB: Mid-Atlantic Ridge, Broken Spur, Mid-Ocean Ridge Hydrothermal Vent Chemistry Data Collection. James (1995), Bau (1999)

rightsList.rights: Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-Share Alike 3.0 United States [CC BY-NC-SA 3.0]

descriptions.description: Collection of hydrothermal vent fluid chemistry data from Mid-Atlantic Ridge, Broken Spur - Raw and end-member data for major, minor, and trace species, transition metals, rare earth elements, and isotopes of B and Sr. This file is just one part of a much larger effort (VentDB) to make available to the scientific community as much hydrothermal ridge vent chemistry data as possible (for a list of all the VentDB related data collections available, search the EarthChem Library for the term VentDB). For more information about this compilation, please see Explanatory Notes and Master Chemical Item Spreadsheet for the VentDB Data Collections housed in the EarthChem Library (M. Mottl), available at www.earthchem.org/library.
Hydrothermal Vent, VentDB, Chemistry, Major Elements, Trace Elements, Isotopes, Rare Earth Elements, Ridge related

geoLocation.geoLocationPlace: Mid-Atlantic Ridge, Broken Spur, Atlantic Ocean
